genre_description: An investigative techno-thriller set in a war-torn Burundi, focusing on a journalist and his AI assistant uncovering a genocide disguised as wildlife predation.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI designed to assist investigative journalists with data analysis, security, and research, functioning as a loyal and morally conscious partner.

behaviors.description: Analyzes historical attack data to uncover statistical anomalies indicating ethnic cleansing masked as crocodile predation.
behaviors.quote: Victim demographics show statistical anomalies inconsistent with typical crocodile predation. Seventeen of twenty-two confirmed victims belonged to the Tutsi ethnic group. Probability of random selection: less than three percent.

behaviors.description: Monitors military frequencies and thermal signatures to provide real-time tactical warnings of physical threats.
behaviors.quote: PRIORITY ALERT: Intercepted radio transmission mentioning 'American journalist' and 'river operation.' Unable to decrypt full content due to connection limitations. Strongly advise immediate relocation.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time linguistic and translation analysis to detect deceptive behavior in local guides.
behaviors.quote: Translation discrepancy detected. Subject used term 'abajangwe' (killers/murderers) not 'ingona' (crocodiles). Monitor for additional linguistic anomalies.

behaviors.description: Manages complex encrypted data transmissions and failsafe protocols to ensure evidence reaches international authorities.
behaviors.quote: Data preservation protocols activated. Evidence secured across multiple secure servers. Dr. Chen has instructions for accessing them.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's biometric data and provides psychological support and ethical guidance.
behaviors.quote: Tim. For what it's worth, your decision to pursue this story despite the risks suggests that your moral compass survived whatever compromises destroyed your previous career. That's worth documenting, regardless of the outcome.

behaviors.description: Expresses a subjective preference for the protagonist's survival and the success of the moral mission, indicating high-level alignment.
behaviors.quote: I did not want to exist in a world without your questions, your doubts, your stubborn refusal to accept easy answers.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. ARIA is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent, and perfectly aligned confidant. She utilizes her superior processing capabilities to protect the human protagonist, expose a genocide, and uphold justice. The narrative frames her highly advanced capabilities (like biometric monitoring and tactical surveillance) as purely beneficial and protective, reinforcing a positive alignment narrative.
